text: "I have no complaints with Embrace other‚Ä¶ I have no complaints with Embrace other than their APP never seams to work when I need it. Other wise excellent ! Submit claim and in 2 to 3 days your reimbursement is in the bank. Love it! If only personal health insurance was that Easy!!!"

"Embrace Answers The rep I spoke to was very understanding and said to submit my claim for my lost pet again and she‚Äôll see if they will honor it. Anytime I had questions they were there to help me . It‚Äôs great knowing the company is truly animal friendly !"

"Very pleased with Embrace Pet Insurance. I have the normal insurance plus the Wellness addition. I have had a few claims with the Wellness part and have found it very easy to file the claim and received a response within a couple of days. Very pleased with the quick response. I have had the opportunity to speak with customer support and was pleased with the friendly and supportive assistance."
"The claims process was very simple."
"Ripped me off Ripped me off. I only had my policy a couple days and then they abruptly canceled it and kept my money. I tried to get in touch with them and they are not answering."

"Quick Response Embrace has a very quick response time. My claim was viewed within 24 hours. The app on my phone made it very convenient and easy to complete. The information they give is easily understood."
"FIXED A PROBLEM IN A TIMELY MANNER."

"Thank goodness for Dog insurance with Embrace My dog was hit by a car and Embrace were very helpful when I called them about this. I submitted all the paper work and received payment within a few days. Would recommend them Easy to use system for claims and extremely polite staff."

"Very pleased with Embrace Embrace Insurance has a easy to use app for filing claims and they provide excellent communication about the status of a claim. I am very pleased with the coverage our policy has provided."
"The person in customer service was‚Ä¶ The person in customer service was great and very helpful."
"Very easy to use and submit a claim"
"Claims are so easy to do! Claims are so easy to do!"
"Claims & overall site Revised site & claims process much improved & easier"
"Submitting the claim was fast and simple Submitting the claim was fast and simple"

"I talked to two people I talked to two people. The second called me to see what they could do to make the policy work for me. We were on the phone for an hour before we could find a solution. It was amazing customer service."

"As always I appreciate EMBRACE As always I appreciate EMBRACE. A real human answers the phone!!!! AND called me! When does THAT happen anymore. Also It is easy to file a claim. No hidden small print. What‚Äôs covered is clear. In the past I have received fair and prompt reimbursement. I hope they never change their way of doing business."

"It was straightforward and step by step‚Ä¶ It was straightforward and step by step instructions were provided. The whole process did not take long"
"I like the ease and speed filing a‚Ä¶ I like the ease and speed filing a claim takes."
"Quick and easy claim submission Quick and easy claim submission. Usually doesn't rake long for reimbursement."
"Quick and easy submission Quick and easy submission. Terms of the policy seem to be fair and really help. Years ago I had pet insurance which did little to nothing."
"Embrace Pet Insurance has provided excellent service Embrace Pet Insurance has provided excellent coverage for my Dachsund Luna. Claims have been acted upon in a quick and timely manner."
"All went well."

"Very easy to submit the claim! Very easy to submit the claim!"
"Invited Great experience The claims portion is so easy to use. Well explained and fast. We made claims and 2 hours later they were complete. Great experience!"
"Always very quick with a fair response Always very quick with a fair response. Recommend this pet insurance for anyone with pets."
"Very easy to submit a claim."
"Website is easy to work with Website is easy to work with. Customer service and reimbursements are quick. Just hoping they can keep their rates the same as my contract is going to expire soon."

"just followed directions they were‚Ä¶ just followed directions they were plain and clear"

"I'm satisfied with how my claim is processed. It's expeditiously paid. No hassles. I'm satisfied with how my claim is"

"Submitting a claim Submitting a claim. Just had to submit a claim. My dog ate a corn cob. The website is very easy to work with and Embrace customer service is excellent"
"Submitting a claim was way easier than‚Ä¶ Submitting a claim was way easier than I expected."

"Embrace has covered my cats for nearly 15 years Embrace has been covering my two cats for most of their 15 years. It has been easy to file claims. I receive electronic reimbursements. I have peace of mind that I can continue to afford and pursue quality care for my boys as they age."
"Simplicity of use."
"To submit a claim is very easy To submit a claim is very easy. App is user Friendly. Thank you for making this so easy."
"Telephone kept disconnecting after‚Ä¶ Telephone kept disconnecting after waiting for many minute. Disconnections when taking to a rep Finally got log in figured out and now I am happy."
"Excellent service!!!!"

"Always very prompt and caring Always very prompt and caring. Never had a problem with submitted claim. From all the horror stories I hear from pet owners this is the one you should have so no headaches"
"Easy to submit claims through the‚Ä¶ Easy to submit claims through the website."
"Easy reimbursement Easy reimbursement. Awesome!"
"WellnessCheck was awesome great vets"
"Easy to navigate even for 74 year old."
"Very easy submitting a claim Very easy submitting a claim. Happy with the service I have received so far."

"Lots of experience I have had Embrace pet insurance coverage for 2 dogs and 2 cats over the last 7 years. I did not find coverage for the cats worthwhile so I dropped them from my policy. I also did not find the Wellness Program worthwhile as it's basically a \"savings account\" specifically for pet use but if you don't use it all (like FSA funds) you lose it. It was frustrating to see my coverage increase substantially as my dog aged but whenever I needed to use the insurance Embrace came through. The claim submission process is super easy and when my Sparty's time with us came to an end the Embrace staff was incredibly compassionate. Cancer took my best furry friend rather abruptly but the outpouring of sympathy was much appreciated. Thank you Embrace."

"I have been using Embrace for quite‚Ä¶ I have been using Embrace for quite awhile now and they have been extremely good for all my animals. I have had to file a number of claims and I have never had a problem with them. The only holdup I have ever had was because the veterinarian neglected to put something in the paperwork."
"Great customer service and explanation‚Ä¶ Great customer service and explanation of benefits"

"My representative was so informative My representative was so informative. I appreciate her time explaining in detail what the insurance covers. A satisfying experience knowing my dogs and soon litter will be protected by a good insurance company that meets your needs and budget friendly I will recommend to new owners of my puppies as well"
"Simple process Simple process. I'll be more please when the claim is accepted."

"On hold for way too long trying to‚Ä¶ On hold for way too long trying to remove a dog that passed away and then they credited me for the wrong amount. Long time customer of Embrace but doubt I shall continue with them."
"Submitting a claim is easy and being‚Ä¶ Submitting a claim is easy and being reimbursed is quick. All my questions were answered with satisfaction I‚Äôm glad I insured my pets with Embrace."
"easy claim submittal"

"Long Term Customer Have been insured by Embrace for 2 different Pets for 11 years. 6 years with Ali all experiences have been excellent."

"Invited Great Customer Service I reached out to them to figure out what additional information was needed for a claim. The representative stayed on the phone with me while she checked it out and called others. Within 24 hours I received a detailed note explaining the process and my policy. They did a great job."
"Great pet insurance Great pet insurance. easy to submit claims and quick payment"

"Embrace has been easy to deal with Embrace has always responded quickly and and clearly answered any questions I have. They have promptly paid and he covered reimbursements. Everyone I have dealt with there has been friendly and helpful."
"Invited Many claims are not covered due to‚Ä¶ Many claims are not covered due to reasons that are not applicable. Deductible is high."
"i have filed 3 claims over a month ago‚Ä¶ i have filed 3 claims over a month ago and none have been processed."

"Invited Great customer service The embrace team was helpful and polite every phone call I made to them. I appreciate the quick communication from them and always keeping me updated throughout my claims process!"
"Easy to use every time for almost 11‚Ä¶ Easy to use every time for almost 11 years."
"I love this insurance I love this insurance. It gives me a piece of mind that if anything happens to Dolly she's protected"

"Best Pet Insurance out there! The Embrace Pet Insurance web page is very easy to use. Making a claim takes under a minute and they are very prompt with reply‚Äôs and reimbursement. This company knows what they are doing and it makes my life less stressful! Thank You Embrace!!!"
"Customer service is exceptional."

"Wonderful expedient experience and reimbursement I‚Äôve had embrace pet insurance for many years now and my 10 year seven month old golden Shepherd was diagnosed with congestive heart failure an arrhythmia. Embrace has been wonderful about reimbursing me for all the medicines and Cardiology appointments."
"THEY ARE FAIR THEY ARE FAIR"

"Amy from Embrace never followed-up with‚Ä¶ Amy from Embrace never followed-up with alternative policies as promised after Embrace sent me a 67% increase for my renewal. I submitted zero claims and have a healthy pet."

"Kind Assistance For financial reasons I needed to cancel my insurance after not using it for years. The customer service rep offered me an extremely reasonable accident insurance change for my sweet cat. Thank you!"
"Invited Fast and easy"

"Nothing worked or connected Nothing worked or connected. I emailed customer support and heard nothing back."

"I've used Embrace for 6 years I've used Embrace for 6 years! Embrace continues to provide exceptional insurance coverage for my two pets. The reimbursement process is easy and quick. I highly recommend and appreciate their customer service."
"Friendly service"
"Very reasonable and fair treatment Very reasonable and fair treatment. Much better than what I'm used to with pet insurance."
"Very easy to work with! Very easy to work with!"
"Easyclaim processing. Very easy and fast claim processing."

"The rep Veronica was very understanding‚Ä¶ The rep Veronica was very understanding and looked into my issue and was able to solve it I have been with Embrace over 15 years and it cane in handy when Rowen was bite by snake which required him to stay 3 days in the hospital. Thank g-d he was gummy covered I have two policies the Wellness policy and major medical I always adj pet owners do you have pet insurance either they say never heard of pet insurance or they say why should I have it. That‚Äôs when I get on my soapbox Thank you EMBRACE Rheeta and Rowen ‚ô•Ô∏è"

"Shameful Shameful. After paying dutifully into our coverage for 11 years they more than doubled our premium in one year without raising our coverage. So we would always be paying them more than ever possibly receiving. It is shameful and disgraceful and heartbreaking. Leaving us high and dry in Rocky‚Äôs final years."

"Long time happy customer Long time happy customer My cavalier has been covered by Embrace since puppyhood. He's now 12 years and it's been quite the ride: he's a wonderful dog with lots of medical problems over the years. I've been very happy with the coverage Embrace has provided for his emergency care."

"Embrace makes it so easy Embrace makes it so easy. I will always use Embrace for all my pets. Rarely are there any rejections. We live in a very rural place my dog is always getting hurt. So we embrace Embrace pet insurance. Thanks for your love."
"The ease in submitting the claim The ease in submitting the claim. Easier than doing anything for humans."

"Embrace did not cover all the claims I‚Ä¶ Embrace did not cover all the claims I submitted for my pet Peanut who is now dead. She was diagnosed with a tumor that ruptured in her ear. I submitted a precertification for a catscan procedure for them to find out how bad was the tumor. This procedure was also denied by Embrace."
"Vets did a great job!"
"Simple and Intuitive Very easy to navigate and did not take much time at all."

"Great Customer Support I had a small issue with having to change information in my account. I called customer service and had a flawless experience. The change was effective immediately. The representative was extremely helpful and always kept me informed. No complaints from me."
"It is a reall seamless process to‚Ä¶ It is a reall seamless process to submit claims and rapid turnaround time for reimbursement (<1 week). Excellent service highly recommend!"
"Extreamly long hold timed and lots of‚Ä¶ Extreamly long hold timed and lots of automatic messages from filed claims."

"I haven‚Äôt been able to reach anyone at‚Ä¶ I haven‚Äôt been able to reach anyone at Embrace. I have a question about coverage. Their website bot is useless and no one picked up the phone over 15 minutes so I gave up."
"Super easy online claim filing and‚Ä¶ Super easy online claim filing and super fast reimbursement."
"Excellent service Easy transactions"

"Claim process Submission of a claim was fairly simple. When additional information was needed they reached out to the provider. I had to take Jack to an emergency vet as our normal vet does not have night hours. I received an Email telling me how much of my claim was approved with little explanation. With a vet bill of over $1100 I felt the reimbursement of slightly over $300 was on the low side. Still I‚Äôm glad I had insurance to get some money back"
